content: around end k2 round 41 knit round 42 *k5 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 43 knit round 44 *k4 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 45 knit round 46 *k3 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 47 knit round 48 *k2 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 49 knit round 50 *k1 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 51 *k2tog repeat from * around cut yarn and weave through stitches on needles at least twice pull tight and weave in end weave in all ends on the inside of the hat make a large pompom 4 ½ to 5 diameter using both colors attach securely to the top of the hat there are several tutorials for pompom making on youtube you don t need any special tools you may also want to mattress stitch or crochet around the bottom of the hat when the brim is folded up to make a nice snug fit
